landing.hero_subtitle: A simple way to organize your next meeting.
landing.how_it_works_text: Simplifying Friend Gatherings! Say goodbye to scheduling headaches with Meetyng – effortlessly create a group, propose dates, and let friends vote. Communicate seamlessly through comments, share a unique event link, and consolidate decisions in one place. Enjoy hassle-free planning, secure data, and unforgettable moments with Meetyng – where organizing meets simplicity!
landing.existing_groups_text: Looks like you have some existing groups. Click on a group to view it.
landing.start_now_title: Start now by creating a new group.

editStepper.step1_title_hint: Enter a descriptive title for your meeting
editStepper.step1_location_hint: Tell other people where you will meet
editStepper.step1_description_placeholder: We will play some awesome board games!
editStepper.step1_description_hint: Enter a short description what you will do at your meeting
editStepper.step2_name_hint: We will display your name on the meeting page to let other people know it's you
editStepper.step2_email_hint: We need your email address to send you the admin key to manage your meeting

vote.link_hint: Share this link with your friends to let them vote

not-found.title: Oh no!
